name: translation-keys-lookup
description: See the texts associated to the translation/i18n keys in your files, next to your keys, without switching context

translationKeysLookup.translationsFolder.markdownDescription:
Path of the root folders to recursively search for translation files.  
They are relative to the workspace root.  
Try to limit the number of files crawled (MAX: 5000) by providing specific paths.

translationKeysLookup.ignoredFolders.markdownDescription: Folders ignored when recursively looking for translation files

translationKeysLookup.translationsFilena.markdownDescription:
Filename(s) of the file(s) containing translations, separated by semicolumns.  
Regular expressions are not supported yet

translationKeysLookup.extensions.markdownDescription: Extensions of the files consumming i18ns keys (i.e: "js;ts")

translationKeysLookup.color.markdownDescription:
Color of the translation text (hex value or html color name)  
ðŸ’¡ Write 'random' for a bit of crazyness

translationKeysLookup.verbose.markdownDescription: Whether output logs are generated or not, in the Debug Console.
